name: Rural Business Investment Program
objective: To promote economic development and create wealth and job opportunities among individuals living in rural areas and help to meet the equity capital investment needs primarily of smaller enterprises located in such areas.
assistance_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description:
$124,396,064 was deployed in 2024.
25 new investments which accounted for $74,888,990 deployed.
36 Add-on investments which accounted for $49,507,674 deployed
